mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saving_account(account_number, join_period, end_date, category, opener_id, saving_name, pet_id) VALUES (#{account_number}, #{join_period}, TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{category}, #{guest_id}, #{saving_name}, #{pet_id})

INSERT INTO join_saving(guest_id, account_number, accept_status, join_date, sms_transfer, sms_maturity, contribution_amount, contribution_ratio) VALUES (#{guest_id}, #{account_number}, 'Y', SYSDATE, #{sms_transfer}, #{sms_maturity}, #{contribution_amount}, #{contribution_ratio})

INSERT INTO auto_transfer(guest_id, account_number_out, account_number_in, amount, period, start_date) VALUES (#{guest_id}, #{deposit_account_number}, #{account_number}, #{amount}, #{period}, #{start_date})
mapper.update: UPDATE deposit_account SET balance = balance - #{amount} WHERE account_number = #{deposit_account_number}
UPDATE saving_account SET balance = balance + #{amount}, progress_rate = progress_rate + #{progress_rate} WHERE account_number = #{account_number}
